   19: %%
   20: -module(gen_tcp_echo_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: %%-compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, 
   28: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   29: 	 active_echo/1, passive_echo/1, active_once_echo/1,
   30: 	 slow_active_echo/1, slow_passive_echo/1,
   31: 	 limit_active_echo/1, limit_passive_echo/1,
   32: 	 large_limit_active_echo/1, large_limit_passive_echo/1]).
   33: 
   34: -define(TPKT_VRSN, 3).
   35: -define(LINE_LENGTH, 1023). % (default value of gen_tcp option 'recbuf') - 1
   36: 
   37: suite() ->
   38:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   39:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   40: 
   41: all() -> 
   42:     [active_echo, passive_echo, active_once_echo,
   43:      slow_active_echo, slow_passive_echo, limit_active_echo,
   44:      limit_passive_echo, large_limit_active_echo,
   45:      large_limit_passive_echo].
   46: 
   47: groups() -> 
   48:     [].
   49: 
   50: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: 
   63: init_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   67:     ok.
   68: 
   69: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
   70: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in active mode).
   71: active_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   72:     echo_test([], fun active_echo/4, [{echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
   73: 
   74: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
   75: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in passive mode).
   76: passive_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   77:     echo_test([{active, false}], fun passive_echo/4,
   78: 	      [{echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
   79: 
   80: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
   81: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in active once mode).
   82: active_once_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     echo_test([{active, once}], fun active_once_echo/4,
   84: 	      [{echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
   85: 
   86: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
   87: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in active mode).
   88: %% The echo server is a special one that delays between every character.
   89: slow_active_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   90:     echo_test([], fun active_echo/4,
   91: 	      [slow_echo, {echo, fun slow_echo_server/0}]).
   92: 
   93: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
   94: %% to an echo server and receiving them again (socket in passive mode).
   95: %% The echo server is a special one that delays between every character.
   96: slow_passive_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   97:     echo_test([{active, false}], fun passive_echo/4,
   98: 	      [slow_echo, {echo, fun slow_echo_server/0}]).
   99: 
  100: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
  101: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in active mode)
  102: %% with packet_size limitation.
  103: limit_active_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     echo_test([{packet_size, 10}],
  105: 	      fun active_echo/4,
  106: 	      [{packet_size, 10}, {echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
  107: 
  108: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
  109: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in passive mode)
  110: %% with packet_size limitation.
  111: limit_passive_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     echo_test([{packet_size, 10},{active, false}],
  113: 	      fun passive_echo/4,
  114: 	      [{packet_size, 10}, {echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
  115: 
  116: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
  117: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in active mode)
  118: %% with large packet_size limitation.
  119: large_limit_active_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     echo_test([{packet_size, 10}],
  121: 	      fun active_echo/4,
  122: 	      [{packet_size, (1 bsl 32)-1},
  123: 	       {echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
  124: 
  125: %% Test sending packets of various sizes and various packet types
  126: %% to the echo port and receiving them again (socket in passive mode)
  127: %% with large packet_size limitation.
  128: large_limit_passive_echo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     echo_test([{packet_size, 10},{active, false}],
  130: 	      fun passive_echo/4,
  131: 	      [{packet_size, (1 bsl 32) -1},
  132: 	       {echo, fun echo_server/0}]).
  133: 
  134: echo_test(SockOpts, EchoFun, Config0) ->
  135:     echo_test_1(SockOpts, EchoFun, Config0),
  136:     io:format("\nrepeating test with {delay_send,true}"),
  137:     echo_test_1([{delay_send,true}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config0).
  138: 
  139: echo_test_1(SockOpts, EchoFun, Config0) ->
  140:     EchoSrvFun = proplists:get_value(echo, Config0),
  141:     {ok, EchoPort} = EchoSrvFun(),
  142:     Config = [{echo_port, EchoPort}|Config0],
  143: 
  144:     echo_packet([{packet, 1}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  145:     echo_packet([{packet, 2}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  146:     echo_packet([{packet, 4}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  147:     echo_packet([{packet, sunrm}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  148:     echo_packet([{packet, cdr}|SockOpts], EchoFun,
  149: 		[{type, {cdr, big}}|Config]),
  150:     echo_packet([{packet, cdr}|SockOpts], EchoFun,
  151: 		[{type, {cdr, little}}|Config]),
  152:     case lists:keymember(packet_size, 1, SockOpts) of
  153: 	false ->
  154: 	    %% This is cheating, we should test that packet_size
  155: 	    %% also works for line and http.
  156: 	    echo_packet([{packet, line}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  157: 	    echo_packet([{packet, http}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  158: 	    echo_packet([{packet, http_bin}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config);
  159: 
  160: 	true -> ok
  161:     end,
  162:     echo_packet([{packet, tpkt}|SockOpts], EchoFun, Config),
  163: 
  164:     ShortTag = [16#E0],
  165:     LongTag = [16#1F, 16#83, 16#27],
  166:     echo_packet([{packet, asn1}|SockOpts], EchoFun,
  167: 		[{type, {asn1, short, ShortTag}}|Config]),
  168:     echo_packet([{packet, asn1}|SockOpts], EchoFun,
  169: 		[{type, {asn1, long, ShortTag}}|Config]),
  170:     echo_packet([{packet, asn1}|SockOpts], EchoFun,
  171: 		[{type, {asn1, short, LongTag}}|Config]),
  172:     echo_packet([{packet, asn1}|SockOpts], EchoFun,
  173: 		[{type, {asn1, long, LongTag}}|Config]),
  174:     ok.
  175: 
  176: echo_packet(SockOpts, EchoFun, Opts) ->
  177:     Type = case lists:keysearch(type, 1, Opts) of
  178: 	       {value, {type, T}} ->
  179: 		   T;
  180: 	       _ ->
  181: 		   {value, {packet, T}} = lists:keysearch(packet, 1, SockOpts),
  182: 		   T
  183: 	   end,
  184: 
  185:     %% Connect to the echo server.
  186:     EchoPort = proplists:get_value(echo_port, Opts),
  187:     {ok, Echo} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, EchoPort, SockOpts),
  188: 
  189:     SlowEcho = lists:member(slow_echo, Opts),
  190: 
  191:     case Type of
  192: 	http ->
  193: 	    echo_packet_http(Echo, Type, EchoFun);
  194: 	http_bin ->
  195: 	    echo_packet_http(Echo, Type, EchoFun);
  196: 	_ ->
  197: 	    echo_packet0(Echo, Type, EchoFun, SlowEcho, Opts)
  198:     end.
  199: 
  200: echo_packet_http(Echo, Type, EchoFun) ->
  201:     lists:foreach(fun(Uri)-> P1 = http_request(Uri),
  202: 			     EchoFun(Echo, Type, P1, http_reply(P1, Type))
  203: 		  end,
  204: 		  http_uri_variants()),
  205:     P2 = http_response(),
  206:     EchoFun(Echo, Type, P2, http_reply(P2, Type)).
  207: 
  208: echo_packet0(Echo, Type, EchoFun, SlowEcho, Opts) ->
  209:     PacketSize =
  210: 	case lists:keysearch(packet_size, 1, Opts) of
  211: 	    {value,{packet_size,Sz}} when Sz < 10 -> Sz;
  212: 	    {value,{packet_size,_}} -> 10;
  213: 	    false -> 0
  214: 	end,
  215:     ct:log("echo_packet0[~w] ~p", [self(), PacketSize]),
  216:     %% Echo small packets first.
  217:     echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 0),
  218:     echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 1),
  219:     echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 2),
  220:     echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 3),
  221:     echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 4),
  222:     echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 7),
  223:     if PacketSize =/= 0 ->
  224: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun,
  225: 			 {PacketSize-1, PacketSize}),
  226: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun,
  227: 			 {PacketSize, PacketSize}),
  228: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun,
  229: 			 {PacketSize+1, PacketSize});
  230:        not SlowEcho -> % Go on with bigger packets if not slow echo server.
  231: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 10),
  232: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 13),
  233: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 126),
  234: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 127),
  235: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 128),
  236: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 255),
  237: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 256),
  238: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 1023),
  239: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 3747),
  240: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 32767),
  241: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 32768),
  242: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 65531),
  243: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 65535),
  244: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 65536),
  245: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, 70000),
  246: 	    echo_packet1(Echo, Type, EchoFun, infinite);
  247:        true -> ok
  248:     end,
  249:     PacketSize =:= 0 andalso
  250:         begin
  251:             %% Switch to raw mode and echo one byte 
  252:             ok = inet:setopts(Echo, [{packet, raw}, {active, false}]),
  253:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Echo, <<"$">>),
  254:             case gen_tcp:recv(Echo, 1) of
  255:                 {ok, <<"$">>} -> ok;
  256:                 {ok, "$"} -> ok
  257:             end
  258:         end,
  259:     _CloseResult = gen_tcp:close(Echo),
  260:     ct:log("echo_packet0[~w] close: ~p", [self(), _CloseResult]),
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: echo_packet1(EchoSock, Type, EchoFun, Size) ->
  264:     case packet(Size, Type) of
  265: 	false ->
  266: 	    ok;
  267: 	Packet ->
  268: 	    io:format("Type ~p, size ~p, time ~p",
  269: 		      [Type, Size, time()]),
  270: 	    case EchoFun(EchoSock, Type, Packet, [Packet]) of
  271: 		ok ->
  272: 		    case Size of
  273: 			{N, Max} when N > Max ->
  274: 			    ct:fail(
  275: 			      {packet_through, {N, Max}});
  276: 			_ -> ok
  277: 		    end;
  278: 		{error, emsgsize} ->
  279: 		    case Size of
  280: 			{N, Max} when N > Max ->
  281: 			    io:format(" Blocked!");
  282: 			_ ->
  283: 			    ct:fail(
  284: 			      {packet_blocked, Size})
  285: 		    end;
  286: 		Error ->
  287: 		    ct:fail(Error)
  288: 	    end
  289:     end.
  290: 
  291: active_echo(Sock, Type, Packet, PacketEchos) ->
  292:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Packet),
  293:     active_recv(Sock, Type, PacketEchos).
  294: 
  295: active_recv(_, _, []) ->
  296:     ok;
  297: active_recv(Sock, Type, [PacketEcho|Tail]) ->
  298:     Tag = case Type of 
  299: 	      http -> http;
  300: 	      http_bin -> http;
  301: 	      _ -> tcp
  302: 	  end,
  303:     receive Recv->Recv end,
  304:     %%io:format("Active received: ~p\n",[Recv]),
  305:     case Recv of
  306: 	{Tag, Sock, PacketEcho} ->
  307: 	    active_recv(Sock, Type, Tail);
  308: 	{Tag, Sock, Bad} ->
  309:             ct:log("Packet: ~p", [inet:getopts(Sock, [packet])]),
  310: 	    ct:fail({wrong_data, Bad, PacketEcho});
  311: 	{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
  312: 	    {error, Reason};
  313: 	Other ->
  314:             ct:log("Packet: ~p", [inet:getopts(Sock, [packet])]),
  315: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other, {Tag, Sock, PacketEcho}})
  316:     end.
  317: 
  318: passive_echo(Sock, _Type, Packet, PacketEchos) ->
  319:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Packet),
  320:     passive_recv(Sock, PacketEchos).
  321: 
  322: passive_recv(_, []) ->
  323:     ok;
  324: passive_recv(Sock, [PacketEcho | Tail]) ->
  325:     Recv = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  326:     %%io:format("Passive received: ~p\n",[Recv]),
  327:     case Recv of
  328: 	{ok, PacketEcho} ->
  329: 	    passive_recv(Sock, Tail);
  330: 	{ok, Bad} ->
  331: 	    io:format("Expected: ~p\nGot: ~p\n",[PacketEcho,Bad]),
  332: 	    ct:fail({wrong_data, Bad, PacketEcho});
  333: 	{error,PacketEcho} ->
  334: 	    passive_recv(Sock, Tail); % expected error
  335: 	{error, _}=Error ->
  336: 	    Error;
  337: 	Other ->
  338: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  339:     end.
  340: 
  341: active_once_echo(Sock, Type, Packet, PacketEchos) ->
  342:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Packet),
  343:     active_once_recv(Sock, Type, PacketEchos).
  344: 
  345: active_once_recv(_, _, []) ->
  346:     ok;
  347: active_once_recv(Sock, Type, [PacketEcho | Tail]) ->
  348:     Tag = case Type of
  349: 	      http -> http;
  350: 	      http_bin -> http;
  351: 	      _ -> tcp
  352: 	  end,
  353:     receive
  354: 	{Tag, Sock, PacketEcho} ->
  355: 	    inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, once}]),
  356: 	    active_once_recv(Sock, Type, Tail);
  357: 	{Tag, Sock, Bad} ->
  358:             ct:log("Packet: ~p", [inet:getopts(Sock, [packet])]),
  359: 	    ct:fail({wrong_data, Bad, PacketEcho});
  360: 	{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
  361: 	    {error, Reason};
  362: 	Other ->
  363:             ct:log("Packet: ~p", [inet:getopts(Sock, [packet])]),
  364: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other, {Tag, Sock, PacketEcho}})
  365:     end.
  366: 
  367: %%% Building of random packets.
  368: 
  369: packet(infinite, {asn1, _, Tag}) ->
  370:     Tag++[16#80];
  371: packet(infinite, _) ->
  372:     false;
  373: packet({Size, _RecvLimit}, Type) ->
  374:     packet(Size, Type);
  375: packet(Size, 1) when Size > 255 ->
  376:     false;
  377: packet(Size, 2) when Size > 65535 ->
  378:     false;
  379: packet(Size, {asn1, _, Tag}) when Size < 128 ->
  380:     Tag++[Size|random_packet(Size)];
  381: packet(Size, {asn1, short, Tag}) when Size < 256 ->
  382:     Tag++[16#81, Size|random_packet(Size)];
  383: packet(Size, {asn1, short, Tag}) when Size < 65536 ->
  384:     Tag++[16#82|put_int16(Size, big, random_packet(Size))];
  385: packet(Size, {asn1, _, Tag}) ->
  386:     Tag++[16#84|put_int32(Size, big, random_packet(Size))];
  387: packet(Size, {cdr, Endian}) ->
  388:     [$G, $I, $O, $P,				% magic
  389:      1, 0,					% major minor
  390:      if Endian == big -> 0; true -> 1 end,	% flags: byte order
  391:      0 |					% message type
  392:      put_int32(Size, Endian, random_packet(Size))];
  393: packet(Size, sunrm) ->
  394:     put_int32(Size, big, random_packet(Size));
  395: packet(Size, line) when Size > ?LINE_LENGTH ->
  396:     false;
  397: packet(Size, line) ->
  398:     random_packet(Size, "\n");
  399: packet(Size, tpkt) ->
  400:     HeaderSize = 4,
  401:     PacketSize = HeaderSize + Size,
  402:     if PacketSize < 65536 ->
  403: 	    Header = [?TPKT_VRSN, 0 | put_int16(PacketSize, big)],
  404: 	    HeaderSize = length(Header), % Just to assert cirkular dependency
  405: 	    Header ++ random_packet(Size);
  406:        true ->
  407: 	    false
  408:     end;
  409: packet(Size, _Type) ->
  410:     random_packet(Size).
  411: 
  412: 
  413: 
  414: random_packet(Size) ->
  415:     random_packet(Size, "", random_char()).
  416: 
  417: random_packet(Size, Tail) ->
  418:     random_packet(Size, Tail, random_char()).
  419: 
  420: random_packet(0, Result, _NextChar) ->
  421:     Result;
  422: random_packet(Left, Result, NextChar0) ->
  423:     NextChar =
  424: 	if
  425: 	    NextChar0 >= 126 ->
  426: 		33;
  427: 	    true ->
  428: 		NextChar0+1
  429: 	end,
  430:     random_packet(Left-1, [NextChar0|Result], NextChar).
  431: 
  432: random_char() ->
  433:     random_char("abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVXYZ0123456789").
  434: 
  435: random_char(Chars) ->
  436:     lists:nth(uniform(length(Chars)), Chars).
  437: 
  438: uniform(N) ->
  439:     rand:uniform(N).
  440: 
  441: put_int32(X, big, List) ->
  442:     [ (X bsr 24) band 16#ff, 
  443:       (X bsr 16) band 16#ff,
  444:       (X bsr 8) band 16#ff,
  445:       (X) band 16#ff | List ];
  446: put_int32(X, little, List) ->
  447:     [ (X) band 16#ff,
  448:       (X bsr 8) band 16#ff,
  449:       (X bsr 16) band 16#ff,
  450:       (X bsr 24) band 16#ff | List].
  451: 
  452: put_int16(X, ByteOrder) ->
  453:     put_int16(X, ByteOrder, []).
  454: 
  455: put_int16(X, big, List) ->
  456:     [ (X bsr 8) band 16#ff,
  457:       (X) band 16#ff | List ];
  458: put_int16(X, little, List) ->
  459:     [ (X) band 16#ff,
  460:       (X bsr 8) band 16#ff | List ].
  461: 
  462: %%% A normal echo server, for systems that don't have one.
  463: 
  464: echo_server() ->
  465:     Self = self(),
  466:     spawn_link(fun() -> echo_server(Self) end),
  467:     receive
  468: 	{echo_port, Port} ->
  469: 	    {ok, Port}
  470:     end.
  471: 
  472: echo_server(ReplyTo) ->
  473:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}, binary]),
  474:     {ok, {_, Port}} = inet:sockname(S),
  475:     ReplyTo ! {echo_port, Port},
  476:     echo_server_loop(S).
  477: 
  478: echo_server_loop(Sock) ->
  479:     {ok, E} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
  480:     Self = self(),
  481:     spawn_link(fun() -> echoer(E, Self) end),
  482:     echo_server_loop(Sock).
  483: 
  484: echoer(Sock, Parent) ->
  485:     unlink(Parent),
  486:     echoer_loop(Sock).
  487: 
  488: echoer_loop(Sock) ->
  489:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
  490: 	{ok, Data} ->
  491: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Data),
  492: 	    echoer_loop(Sock);
  493: 	{error, closed} ->
  494: 	    ok
  495:     end.
  496: 
  497: %%% A "slow" echo server, which will echo data with a short delay
  498: %%% between each character.
  499: 
  500: slow_echo_server() ->
  501:     Self = self(),
  502:     spawn_link(fun() -> slow_echo_server(Self) end),
  503:     receive
  504: 	{echo_port, Port} ->
  505: 	    {ok, Port}
  506:     end.
  507: 
  508: slow_echo_server(ReplyTo) ->
  509:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}, {nodelay, true}]),
  510:     {ok, {_, Port}} = inet:sockname(S),
  511:     ReplyTo ! {echo_port, Port},
  512:     slow_echo_server_loop(S).
  513: 
  514: slow_echo_server_loop(Sock) ->
  515:     {ok, E} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
  516:     spawn_link(fun() -> slow_echoer(E, self()) end),
  517:     slow_echo_server_loop(Sock).
  518: 
  519: slow_echoer(Sock, Parent) ->
  520:     unlink(Parent),
  521:     slow_echoer_loop(Sock).
  522: 
  523: slow_echoer_loop(Sock) ->
  524:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
  525: 	{ok, Data} ->
  526: 	    slow_send(Sock, Data),
  527: 	    slow_echoer_loop(Sock);
  528: 	{error, closed} ->
  529: 	    ok
  530:     end.
  531: 
  532: slow_send(Sock, [C|Rest]) ->
  533:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, [C]),
  534:     receive after 1 ->
  535: 		    slow_send(Sock, Rest)
  536: 	    end;
  537: slow_send(_, []) ->
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: http_request(Uri) ->
  541:     list_to_binary(["POST ", Uri, <<" HTTP/1.1\r\n"
  542: 				    "Connection: close\r\n"
  543: 				    "Host: localhost:8000\r\n"
  544: 				    "User-Agent: perl post\r\n"
  545: 				    "Content-Length: 4\r\n"
  546: 				    "Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n"
  547: 				    "Other-Field: with some text\r\n"
  548: 				    "Multi-Line: Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n"
  549: 				    " there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n"
  550: 				    " of the most haunted castle.\r\n"
  551: 				    "Invalid line without a colon\r\n"
  552: 				    "\r\n">>]).
  553: 
  554: http_uri_variants() ->
  555:     ["*",
  556:      "http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfcX3986",
  557:      "http://otp.ericsson.se:8000/product/internal/",
  558:      "https://example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose",
  559:      "ftp://cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm",
  560:      "/some/absolute/path",
  561:      "something_else", "something_else"].
  562: 
  563: http_response() ->
  564:     <<"HTTP/1.0 404 Object Not Found\r\n"
  565:       "Server: inets/4.7.16\r\n"
  566:       "Date: Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT\r\n"
  567:       "Content-Type: text/html\r\n"
  568:       "Content-Length: 207\r\n"
  569:       "\r\n">>.
  570: 
  571: http_reply(Bin, Type) ->
  572:     {ok, Line, Rest} = erlang:decode_packet(Type,Bin,[]),
  573:     HType = case Type of
  574: 		http -> httph;
  575: 		http_bin -> httph_bin
  576: 	    end,
  577:     Ret = lists:reverse(http_reply(Rest,[Line],HType)),
  578:     io:format("HTTP: ~p\n",[Ret]),
  579:     Ret.
  580: 
  581: http_reply(<<>>, Acc, _) ->
  582:     Acc;
  583: http_reply(Bin, Acc, HType) ->
  584:     {ok, Line, Rest} = erlang:decode_packet(HType,Bin,[]),	
  585:     http_reply(Rest, [Line | Acc], HType).
